TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23esdselect * from (SELECT a.userid, sgu.employee_id, --results in "= '[SG]'" for a non-multi-salesgroup user --results in "IN ([List of SalesGroups])" for multi-SalesGroup user decode(sgu.employee_id, null, ' = ''' || salesgroup || '''', ' in (''' || replace(LISTAGG(sgg.salesgroups) WITHIN GROUP(order by 1), ',', ''',''') || ''')') multis FROM ESTARS.employee_BASE a, ESTARS.multi_sg_user sgu, ESTARS.multi_sg_group sgg where a.employee_id = sgu.employee_id(+) and sgg.multi_sg_group_id(+) = sgu.multi_sg_group_id group by a.userid, salesGroup, sgu.employee_id) where length(multis) > 10 and userid is not null
